text: 15:29 Ofa Gami 17:14; Aposel 15:20; 21:25; Akar Mogomem 2:14; 2:20Ia me marvir guabagh anɨdir daghebar aman markɨ, egh asɨzibar ghuzibar aman markɨ, egh me beniba fɨribagh afi ariaghirir asɨzibar aman markɨ, egh uari isava akuir arazir kurabar amuan markɨ. Ia bizir kaba ategh deragham. En akam kamaghɨra tu.
